body:
With this patch, the `/classify/` view gives me this:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/mythmon/src/normandy/venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 149, in get_response
    response = self.process_exception_by_middleware(e, request)
  File "/home/mythmon/src/normandy/venv/lib/python3.5/site-packages/django/core/handlers/base.py", line 147, in get_response
    response = wrapped_callback(request, *callback_args, **callback_kwargs)
  File "/home/mythmon/src/normandy/normandy/classifier/views.py", line 15, in classify
    return HttpResponseRedirect(BundlerView.url_for(bundle))
  File "/home/mythmon/src/normandy/normandy/bundler/views.py", line 29, in url_for
    return urlparams(reverse('normandy.bundler'), hash=bundle.hash, ids=bundle.ids)
  File "/home/mythmon/src/normandy/normandy/bundler/models.py", line 17, in hash
    recipe_hashes = '_'.join([recipe.content_hash for recipe in self.recipes])
  File "/home/mythmon/src/normandy/normandy/bundler/models.py", line 17, in <listcomp>
    recipe_hashes = '_'.join([recipe.content_hash for recipe in self.recipes])
AttributeError: 'Recipe' object has no attribute 'content_hash'
```
